summary: This is for the Platinum Blond lovers.
descriptionHtml:
Hair retex for RANs Hair

Hair texture re-colored to match more closely to vanilla.  This is for the Platinum Blond lovers.

Required: Download and install [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6394]RANs Hair No2 v11[/url]

For use...Move Hair02.nif from meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\hair\\RANs to meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\hair.
Overwrite Hair01.dds found in Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\hair\\RANs with Hair01.dds from this download.
To get the style in-game.  Open console and type showracemenu

Additional note.  Had CTD with this style (if it was this or another mod, i don\'t know)  Use at your own risk

Credits to RAN46 for the style
author: sixt6
